prompt: Design a professional rating screen with a white background and a centered layout. At the top, display a rectangular app icon, 100x60 pixels, with a blue-to-cyan gradient and a white checkmark icon. Add a bold 'Rate Our App' title in dark blue, 30px font size. Include a centered descriptive text in dark gray, 15px font size, asking for user feedback. Show 5 interactive blue star icons in a horizontal row, each 42px in size. Below, include a wide, rounded cyan 'Submit Feedback' button and a transparent 'Not Now' button with a cyan border and text, both with 16px font size. Use a Column layout with 22px spacing for a polished, professional design.
